name: Police Car Driver Simulator - Drive Cops Car, Race, Chase & Arrest Mafia Robbers
name_original: Police Car Driver Simulator - Drive Cops Car, Race, Chase & Arrest Mafia Robbers
description:
Legend Police Car Driving Simulator is all new, stunt car driving game, go to extreme speeds and jump off the biggest stunt in super charged police cars, FOR FREE!

Do you want to go fast and have no limits? Now you can, drive from a garage full of powerful police cop cars on the most extreme stunts in the world! Drive, rush, boost, drift, roll, jump, and crash your police car in our all new extreme police driver's crash scene!


Be the best police officer stunt driver in stunt and drift city. There's no need to use brakes, race boost your police sports cars onto so many of unique stunts and tricks to perform the world's most amazing stunts. Choose from a wide choice of police vehicles and drive wherever you want in both cities. With our latest game, you'll get to experience realistic car damage by hitting into obstacles and crashing cars to see full body damage. In Legend Police Car Driving Simulator, do the biggest jumps, fastest drifts, and accelerate to blistering top speeds to do difficult stunts. Take prisoners to the court house and reach the judge in time.

GAME FEATURES
- The best car driving physics
- Huge open world city environment, stunt city and drift city, more to come soon!
- Interact with real world objects and surfaces, crash through billboards!
- Realistic vehicle damage, every hit and scrape shown with each collision
- Authentic police car lights and sounds
- Huge selection of high quality police vehicles, all modeled off real sports cars!
- Easy to use driving controls, both touch and tilt controls!
- Upgrades available for cars after completing challenges
